Outline:

This week we are going build upon the regression framework we introduced last week and consider how to manage analyses where you have multiple explanatory variables. The session is structured:

Introduction: Outline of multiple linear regression (some basic maths) 
PART ONE: Additive multiple Linear Regression in R
PART TWO: Multiplicative multiple Linear Regression in R
PART THREE: Model selection / parsimony [how do we know which combination of explanatory variable is best?]
